module.name: Simple Image Captcha
module.author: Alain Bertrand
module.description: Handles a complete captcha system which should reduce if not block all bots.

key.name: captchaNoise
key.description: Add noise over the captcha image. Increase difficulty for OCR as well as for the user to read it.

key.name: captchaDeform
key.description: Deformation ratio. A value of 0 would mean a straight text.

key.name: captchaLength
key.description: Length of the text to type back.
